justification: B needs immediate floor and already has multiple pocket QBs; Hall adds little. Asking B to trade a healthy, low-volatility RB (King) and ascending WR2 (Austin Torres) for a bench QB and an OUT WR is misaligned. Calling Harris “stable” contradicts his injury. Torres isn’t a possession WR. The rationale ignores B’s priorities (volume, floor) and overstates accept probability.
